name: European Solar-Shading Organization vzw
goal: ES-SO is a not-for-profit organization to Belgian Law (ES-SO vzw) established in Brussels. It is the umbrella organization of the professional solar shading associations in the various Member States of the EU.  ES-SO's aim is to ensure that the industry's voice is heard and that it can make a positive contribution towards the EU meeting its ambitious energy efficiency commitments. ES-SO is also involved in various EU projects and acts in both a contributory and advisory capacity.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Internal Market, Public Health
euInitiatives:
European Directives related to Energy such as

EPBD, EED, RES and ELD

Energy Union and Climate Action policies
